item.title: Pet Shop Boys - Go West
item.description:

our way(together)

We will make our plans

goodbye(together)

gonna do-

item.title: Pet Shop Boys - West End Girls
item.description:
Sometimes
you’re better
Off dead There’s a
gun in your hand
It’s pointing at
your head You
Think you’re mad
too unstable
Kicking in chairs
And knocking down
Tables In a restaurant
in a West End town
Call the
police
There’s a
madman around
Running
down
Underground
to a dive bar
In a West End
town In a West
End town a
dead end world
The East End boys
West End girls

a dead end world
The East End
boys West
End girls
West End girls

whispering
Voices

Posters too
many choices
If when why what?

Have you got?

Do you

which do you

soft option?

town a dead end world
